entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having grown a few inches over the last year and has jet-black hair that is untidy.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as the most feared Dark wizard for a hundred years who murdered Harry's parents.

relationships.description: Harry was attacked by Voldemort, resulting in a scar on his forehead.
Voldemort's curse rebounded upon its originator, leaving Harry barely alive.
